articles.author: Aleksandar Gilbert
articles.description: Stablegains offered U.S. users a 15% yield on their deposits and used Anchor Protocol behind the scenes. Now, users are alleging they were scammed after UST's collapse.
articles.title: Stablegains Under Fire After Going All-In On Anchor

articles.author: Owen Fernau
articles.description: Analysis of the 2022 crypto bear market in the context of previous cycles.
articles.title: Is It Different This Time? Analysts Explain This Year’s Crypto Crash

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description:
Ethereum scaling solution Optimism today announced Bedrock, an upgrade that improves speeds and cuts costs for those that trade on the L2. Optimism is a rollup: a Layer 2 scaling solution that batches transactions on another blockchain, then feeds them back to Ethereum as a single transaction. Rollups enjoy the security of Ethereum’s mainnet while …
  Optimism Targets ‘Ethereum Equivalence’ With New L2 Upgrade Read More »
articles.title: Optimism Targets ‘Ethereum Equivalence’ With New L2 Upgrade

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description:
ConsenSys, Joe Lubin’s Ethereum software company, has rolled out a new tool it claims will smoothen Ethereum’s transition to Proof of Stake in August, also known as “The Merge.” The tool, “Bonsai Tries State Storage”, came out of early access on May 17. It runs on ConsenSys’s Ethereum client, Hyperledger Besu. State tries are Ethereum …
  ConsenSys Pushes Upgrade for Ethereum Validators Ahead of Q3 Merge Read More »
articles.title: ConsenSys Pushes Upgrade for Ethereum Validators Ahead of Q3 Merge

articles.author: Jason Levin
articles.description: FTX now operates the first stock trading platform that allows users to fund their accounts with fiat-backed stablecoins like USDC.
articles.title: FTX Launches US Equities Trading with Stablecoins as a Funding Option
